metaface.dsp
Class DigitalSignalProcessor

java.lang.Object
  metaface.dsp.DigitalSignalProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetaFaceMbrola
public abstract class DigitalSignalProcessor
extends Object

This class defines the structure by which all inheriting Digital Signal Processors (DSPs) must adhere. A DSP takes textual phoneme information and synthesises speech audio

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard

synthesise

public abstract String synthesise(String input)
Sythesise phoneme information into a speech audio file

Parameters:
input - A string of phoneme information
Returns:
A speech audio file name string

getViseme

public abstract int getViseme(String ph)

Get the visual equivalent of a phoneme

Parameters:
ph - The phoneme to look up
Returns:
An MPEG-4 numbered viseme representing the phoneme

phonemesToVisemes

public abstract Vector phonemesToVisemes(String phonemeinfo)

Get the visual equivalents of phonemes

Parameters:
phonemeinfo - The phoneme information (phonemes and duration)
Returns:
The MPEG-4 numbered visemes representing the phoneme information and durations (milliseconds):
[viseme1][duration1][viseme2][duration2][viseme3] ...

silencePhonemeString

public abstract String silencePhonemeString(int milliseconds)
Get a phoneme string representing a silent duration

Parameters:
milliseconds - The duration of the silence
Returns:
A phoneme string representing the silence
